Class PaginationList<T>

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>

          java.util.ArrayList<T>
              com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.PaginationList<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The generic type for datasource.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<T>, java.util.Collection<T>, java.util.List<T>, java.util.RandomAccess
public class PaginationList<T>
extends java.util.ArrayList<T>

An ArrayList with four pagination informations, used to return the SQL's resultset and pagination info as additional.

See Also:
DBOverseer.getPaginationList(com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement.Statement, int, int, java.lang.Class), Serialized Form
